docs.text: Data Augumentations ¶ サンプル写真の表示 ¶ ライブラリのimport ¶ 1 2 3 4 5 import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import albumentations as A import numpy as np import cv2 from PIL import Image === 'Pillow' 1 2 img = Image . open ( image_path ) plt . imshow ( img ) === 'OpenCV' 1 2 3 image = cv2 . imread ( image_path ) image = cv2 . cvtColor ( image , cv2 . COLOR_BGR2RGB ) plt . imshow ( img )
